attributes.action: Change Snapchat back to how it was. It doesn't feel like Snapchat anymore.
attributes.background: Majority of the snapchat users are unhappy with this update. It has caused many disruptions. Many people have deleted Snapchat due to the update. There are constant updates, many in which people are unhappy with however this new update has totally changed Snapchat and has caused the most problems.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for Snapchat.

You can find out more about the role of the UK Government and Parliament here: 

http://www.parliament.uk/education/about-your-parliament/what-parliament-does/
